passive.name: Exorcism
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When entering battle, immediately regenerates <orangeStrong>{{2, fixed(fixed: 1)}}</orangeStrong> Energy. After the wearer uses Ultimate, obtains "Raiton." After using 2 Basic ATKs, advances the wearer's action by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> and removes "Raiton." After the wearer uses Ultimate, resets "Raiton."
